subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Eri Yoshida, an 18-year-old female knuckleball pitcher from Japan, arrived amid widespread fanfare but did little to disprove critics who saw her presence as a publicity stunt.
snippet: Eri Yoshida, an 18-year-old female knuckleball pitcher from Japan, arrived amid widespread fanfare but did little to disprove critics who saw her presence as a publicity stunt.
